price: 83. Mpe Ayûb, tango abelelaki Nkolo wa ye, ete ya soló, mpasi esili koleka ngai, mpe yo nde ozali ngolu wa bangolu koleka.
arabic: ۞ وَأَيُّوبَ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّي مَسَّنِيَ ٱلضُّرُّ وَأَنتَ أَرۡحَمُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-ayyūba idh nādā rabbahu annī massaniya al-ḍuru wa-anta arḥamu al-rāḥimīna
